name: SAKIS - Underworld
description:
In the world full of sorrow, danger and mythical creatures. The world where revenge is the only reason to live for!

SAKIS - Underworld is an oldschool, 2D platform game (for PC, Windows). It tells a story of a greek ex-soldier, that was forced to face horrible truth and start a dangerous journey.
  • 12 levels plus 3 hidden extra levels and many bonus rooms
  • try out Special Skills
  • meet mythical characters
  • fight with various enemies
  • collect hidden treasures
  • ...and find the answer at the bottom of Hades!
